channel.title: Server still running after I close it PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
I was looking for a 317 source to use, and i found one called universalscape 317, but later on i decided i would like one with customs, so I got another source. I went to run the other source and it gives me this error:
[6/2/11 3:16 PM]: Launching Teamtorva in 3... 2... 1... Starting...Now! [6/2/11 3:16 PM]: java.net.BindException: Address is already in use: bind[6/2/11 3:16 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method)[6/2/11 3:16 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(unknown Source)[6/2/11 3:16 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unkown Source)[6/2/11 3:16 pm]: at org.apache.minia.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.registerNew(SocketAcceptor.java.363)
The GUI said the server was online so i opened the client and when i logged in the I was logged into the old server, even though i had closed the cmd prompt that ran the server. Could anyone help me out with what this error means and how I can shut down my old server so I can use my new one? Much thanks.

item.title: Server still running after I close it PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

It worked, thanks. I was just worried something might have happened if i removed it from the processes list.

Read full topic

@imsuperman05 wrote:

try both? and see if it works

item.title: Server still running after I close it PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

the system processes I see are :
javaw.exe *32
jusched.exe *32

Would one of those be causing the problem?

item.source: Server still running after I close it PLEASE HELP

item.title: Server still running after I close it PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

I don’t have any other programs using the same port in the applications section of my task manager, would I have to go to the processes section of my task manager to get rid of what’s running?

Read full topic
item.source: Server still running after I close it PLEASE HELP

item.title: Server still running after I close it PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

It means you have something else running, using the same port. close any other java programs you’re running.

Read full topic
